description: Comprehensive operational metrics for DevOps teams monitoring system health, performance, and reliability

panels.description: Median total time taken across all core services (ASR, Translation, and TTS).
panels.title: Overall Latency (Seconds)

panels.description: Median overall latency changes over the selected time period.
panels.title: Overall Latency Trend (Seconds)

panels.description: Median time taken by ASR

targets.expr:
sum by (endpoint) (rate(telemetry_obsv_request_duration_seconds_sum{organization=~"$organization", app=~"$app", endpoint!~"/enterprise/metrics|/enterprise/health|/enterprise/config|/|/metrics-info"}[5m]))
/
sum by (endpoint) (rate(telemetry_obsv_request_duration_seconds_count{organization=~"$organization", app=~"$app", endpoint!~"/enterprise/metrics|/enterprise/health|/enterprise/config|/|/metrics-info"}[5m]))

panels.title: ASR Latency (Seconds)
